draw_prompt: A minimalist room with perfect right angles in every element: square window frames casting geometric shadows, cube-shaped furniture arranged at 90-degree angles, and grid-patterned floor tiles. Sharp edges and crisp lines dominate, rendered in bold monochrome with high contrast.
